name: Denis Shapovalov
description:
The tennis world has a brand new star! His name is Denis Shapovalov, he is only 18 years old, but he already won the junior Wimbledon and has beaten Rafael Nadal! With a name like that, he must be Russian...

Correct, but: Denis' parents are Russian. He was born in Israel, so he must be Israeli...

Correct, but: Denis' family moved to Canada before he was one year old, and he represents Canada intentionally, so he must be Canadian...

Correct, but: Denis currently lives in the Bahamas, so he must be Bahamian...

Correct, but: Wait, didn't we say he was born in Israel? He must be Jewish...

Correct, but: Even though Denis is Halachically Jewish, he wears a cross.

Unfortunately, that's correct.
